metadata.description: A project roadmap managed by Project Roadmap Tracking
metadata.name: My Project Roadmap

tasks.details: Set up workspace members and shared [workspace.dependencies] per plan Month 1.
tasks.title: Initialize Cargo workspace

tasks.details: Set up GitHub Actions to build/test on Windows, macOS, Linux.
tasks.title: CI/CD: build+test matrix

tasks.details: Add test coverage reporting in CI (choose tool + upload/report).
tasks.title: CI/CD: coverage reporting

tasks.details: Automate tagged release builds/artifacts via GitHub Actions.
tasks.title: CI/CD: release automation

tasks.details: Implement ModInfo metadata struct with serde Serialize/Deserialize + required fields + defaults.
tasks.title: nmm-core: ModInfo with serde support

tasks.details: Define core game mode traits in nmm-core (descriptor + runtime).
tasks.title: nmm-core: GameModeDescriptor + GameMode traits

tasks.details: Define ModFormat trait + FormatConfidence enum to model archive formats.
tasks.title: nmm-core: ModFormat trait + FormatConfidence

tasks.details: Create library error enums using thiserror; wire through core traits as needed.
tasks.title: nmm-core: error types (thiserror)

tasks.details: Set up integration test patterns (temp dirs, fixtures, cross-platform assumptions).
tasks.title: Integration test framework

tasks.details: Design schema for mods/file_owners/ini_edits tables + indices + migration strategy.
tasks.title: Install log: design SQLite schema

tasks.details: Define InstallLog trait API (mods, file ownership, ini edits, backup/transactions) in nmm-core.
tasks.title: nmm-core: InstallLog trait

tasks.details: Create nmm-install-log crate with rusqlite connection management and basic persistence.
tasks.title: nmm-install-log: crate skeleton + rusqlite

tasks.details: Implement mod registration + active mods list persisted in SQLite.
tasks.title: nmm-install-log: implement mods table

tasks.details: Implement file_owners stack/ordering semantics (current owner / previous owner / installers list).
tasks.title: nmm-install-log: file ownership tracking

tasks.details: Implement ini_edits ownership stack (current owner / previous value lookup).
tasks.title: nmm-install-log: INI edits tracking

tasks.details: Add transaction support (begin/commit/rollback) to match NMM install/uninstall semantics.
tasks.title: nmm-install-log: SQLite transactions

tasks.details: Implement InstallLog.xml importer to migrate existing C# NMM installs into SQLite.
tasks.title: Install log: XML import tool

tasks.details: Unit test file_owners + ini_edits stack behavior and transaction rollback cases.
tasks.title: Install log: unit tests for ownership

tasks.details: Implement create_link API and LinkType strategy with copy fallback; define VfsError.
tasks.title: nmm-vfs: link abstraction (symlink/hardlink/copy)

tasks.details: Implement Windows symlink creation + Developer Mode / privilege detection and fallback behavior.
tasks.title: nmm-vfs: Windows symlink handling

tasks.details: Implement macOS symlink behavior (Unix symlink) and verify directory/file cases.
tasks.title: nmm-vfs: macOS symlink handling

tasks.details: Support hardlink fallback constraints (same filesystem) and multi-drive scenarios.
tasks.title: nmm-vfs: multi-drive hardlink support

tasks.details: Implement conflict resolution: higher priority wins, deterministic ordering, link update strategy.
tasks.title: nmm-vfs: priority resolution algorithm

tasks.details: Parse and write VirtualModConfig.xml (versioned) to persist virtual install state.
tasks.title: nmm-vfs: VirtualModConfig.xml read/write

tasks.details: Integration tests using temp dirs: link strategies, conflict resolution, platform branches.
tasks.title: nmm-vfs: integration tests

tasks.details: Create nmm-game-modes crate and public APIs for game mode discovery/registration.
tasks.title: nmm-game-modes: crate skeleton

tasks.details: Implement Windows game install detection via registry keys (per game).
tasks.title: Game detection: Windows registry

tasks.details: Implement macOS game install detection via standard paths (Steam library, app bundles).
tasks.title: Game detection: macOS paths

tasks.details: Add registry of all supported game mode descriptors + selection by mode_id.
tasks.title: Game mode registry

tasks.details: Create nmm-games crate layout and module organization for per-game implementations.
tasks.title: nmm-games: crate structure

tasks.details: Implement INI file read/write helpers for Gamebryo-family games.
tasks.title: Gamebryo base: INI handling

tasks.details: Implement plugin directory resolution + writable paths for Gamebryo-family games.
tasks.title: Gamebryo base: plugin directory management

tasks.details: Implement mod-format adjusted paths (FOMod/OMod) for legacy compatibility.
tasks.title: Gamebryo base: legacy mod path adjustment

tasks.details: Detect Steam library folders cross-platform and expose helpers to game detection.
tasks.title: Steam library path detection

tasks.details: Implement Skyrim Special Edition GameModeDescriptor/GameMode + detection hooks.
tasks.title: Skyrim SE: game mode implementation

tasks.details: Implement .esp/.esm/.esl handling, plugins.txt + loadorder.txt read/write.
tasks.title: Skyrim SE: plugin management

tasks.details: Detect SKSE installation and expose status to UI/backend.
tasks.title: Skyrim SE: SKSE detection

tasks.details: Implement Fallout 4 GameModeDescriptor/GameMode + detection hooks.
tasks.title: Fallout 4: game mode implementation

tasks.details: Implement plugin list handling similar to Skyrim SE (plugins.txt/loadorder.txt).
tasks.title: Fallout 4: plugin management

tasks.details: Detect F4SE installation and expose status to UI/backend.
tasks.title: Fallout 4: F4SE detection

tasks.details: Implement Starfield GameModeDescriptor/GameMode + detection hooks.
tasks.title: Starfield: game mode implementation

tasks.details: Implement Starfield-specific plugin format and list file semantics.
tasks.title: Starfield: updated plugin format handling

tasks.details: Detect SFSE installation and expose status to UI/backend.
tasks.title: Starfield: SFSE detection

tasks.details: Investigate LOOT masterlist formats needed for basic auto-sorting.
tasks.title: LOOT: masterlist parsing research

tasks.details: Implement basic plugin sorting using LOOT masterlist parsing results.
tasks.title: Plugin auto-sorting (basic)

tasks.details: Create nmm-archive crate and core archive abstraction (list/extract).
tasks.title: nmm-archive: crate skeleton

tasks.details: Implement zip archive listing + extraction.
tasks.title: Archive extraction: zip support

tasks.details: Implement 7z archive listing + extraction.
tasks.title: Archive extraction: 7z support

tasks.details: Determine approach for rar support (library choice, licensing, fallback behavior).
tasks.title: Archive extraction: rar support research

tasks.details: Implement stop-folder based structure detection for archives.
tasks.title: Archive structure detection (stop folders)

tasks.details: Implement algorithm to identify mod root inside archive (using stop folders + heuristics).
tasks.title: Mod root detection algorithm

tasks.details: Implement parsing of FOMod metadata (info.xml).
tasks.title: FOMod: parse fomod/info.xml

tasks.details: Detect and classify fomod/ModuleConfig.xml for scripted installs.
tasks.title: FOMod: detect ModuleConfig.xml

tasks.details: Implement legacy OMod format detection and extraction.
tasks.title: OMod: legacy format support

tasks.details: Create nmm-scripting crate and public APIs for script parsing/execution.
tasks.title: nmm-scripting: crate skeleton

tasks.details: Parse XmlScript ModuleConfig.xml across supported versions.
tasks.title: XmlScript parser (v1-v5)

tasks.details: Implement condition evaluation engine used by XmlScript installers.
tasks.title: XmlScript: condition evaluation

tasks.details: Implement file selection and wildcard/pattern matching semantics.
tasks.title: XmlScript: file pattern matching

tasks.details: Define UI-agnostic interface for presenting installer options and collecting user choices.
tasks.title: XmlScript: UI abstraction for options

tasks.details: Execute parsed XmlScript plan to produce file operations and install actions.
tasks.title: XmlScript executor

tasks.details: Implement legacy ModScript interpreter for Morrowind/Oblivion mods.
tasks.title: ModScript interpreter

tasks.details: Integrate wasmtime and define WASM script interface.
tasks.title: WASM scripting foundation (wasmtime)

tasks.details: Add sandboxing limits (fs/network/time) for executing WASM scripts safely.
tasks.title: WASM script sandboxing

tasks.details: Initialize Tauri desktop app project (apps/nmm-desktop) with Rust backend.
tasks.title: Desktop: initialize Tauri project

tasks.details: Set up React frontend scaffolding, routing/state, build pipeline within Tauri app.
tasks.title: Desktop: React frontend structure

tasks.details: Expose backend command(s) for listing/selecting detected game modes.
tasks.title: Desktop: Tauri command - game mode selection

tasks.details: Expose backend command(s) for listing/adding/removing/enabling mods.
tasks.title: Desktop: Tauri command - mod list management

tasks.details: Expose backend command(s) for install/uninstall operations (archive -> vfs/install-log).
tasks.title: Desktop: Tauri command - install/uninstall

tasks.details: Implement initial mod list UI (enabled state, sorting, status).
tasks.title: Desktop UI: basic mod list view

tasks.details: Implement mod details panel (metadata, version, author, links, conflicts placeholder).
tasks.title: Desktop UI: mod details panel

tasks.details: Implement plugin ordering UI with drag-and-drop and persistence.
tasks.title: Desktop UI: plugin ordering (drag-and-drop)

tasks.details: Implement profile selector + create/clone/delete profiles; wire to backend.
tasks.title: Desktop UI: profiles

tasks.details: Build installation wizard UI powered by XmlScript UI abstraction.
tasks.title: Desktop UI: installation wizard (XmlScript)

tasks.details: Add settings UI for paths, behavior toggles, diagnostics.
tasks.title: Desktop UI: settings panel

tasks.details: Implement UI for detecting file/plugin conflicts and selecting resolution/priority.
tasks.title: Desktop UI: conflict detection/resolution

tasks.details: Implement nxm:// protocol support end-to-end (open link -> enqueue download).
tasks.title: Desktop: nxm:// protocol handler

tasks.details: Register nxm:// URL protocol handler on Windows.
tasks.title: Desktop: Windows URL protocol registration

tasks.details: Register/handle nxm:// URL scheme on macOS.
tasks.title: Desktop: macOS URL scheme handling

tasks.details: Integrate Nexus Mods API for mod search and display results in UI.
tasks.title: Nexus API: mod search

tasks.details: Implement download queue (start/pause/cancel), progress reporting, storage paths.
tasks.title: Nexus API: download queue

tasks.details: Implement update checking for installed mods via Nexus Mods API.
tasks.title: Nexus API: update checking

tasks.details: Implement theming (light/dark + game-specific theme hooks).
tasks.title: Desktop: theme support

tasks.details: Add global/local keyboard shortcuts for common actions.
tasks.title: Desktop: keyboard shortcuts

tasks.details: Improve accessibility (focus states, ARIA, contrast, screen reader labels).
tasks.title: Desktop: accessibility improvements

tasks.details: Build importer that migrates existing NMM InstallLog.xml into SQLite install log.
tasks.title: Migration: import InstallLog.xml

tasks.details: Build importer that migrates existing NMM VirtualModConfig.xml into new VFS config.
tasks.title: Migration: import VirtualModConfig.xml

tasks.details: Migrate NMM profile data into new profiles system.
tasks.title: Migration: profile migration

tasks.details: Optional: import Vortex installations into NMM-Rust.
tasks.title: Migration: Vortex importer (optional)

tasks.details: Add end-to-end integration tests covering install/uninstall, conflicts, profiles, scripting.
tasks.title: Testing: comprehensive integration suite

tasks.details: Add benchmarks for install/uninstall, archive extraction, DB operations.
tasks.title: Performance benchmarking

tasks.details: Profile and reduce memory usage in archive extraction, caching, and UI.
tasks.title: Memory usage optimization

tasks.details: Write end-user docs: install, setup, adding mods, troubleshooting.
tasks.title: Docs: user documentation

tasks.details: Improve Rust crate docs, API examples, and architecture notes.
tasks.title: Docs: developer documentation (crate docs)

tasks.details: Document how to add new game modes, detection, and plugin handling.
tasks.title: Docs: game mode development guide

tasks.details: Plan and run beta: feedback channels, crash reporting, release cadence.
tasks.title: Beta testing program

tasks.details: Finalize release pipeline (versioning, changelog, signing, artifact publishing).
tasks.title: Release automation (end-to-end)

tasks.details: Create Windows installer/package (MSI/MSIX), signing, updates.
tasks.title: Packaging: Windows MSI/MSIX

tasks.details: Create macOS DMG packaging, signing/notarization.
tasks.title: Packaging: macOS DMG

tasks.details: Create Linux packages (AppImage and/or Flatpak) for distribution.
tasks.title: Packaging: Linux AppImage/Flatpak
